preqs: An aptitude test, APG5049 and APG5875 or APG4813 and APG4816, or with permission

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {APG4813, APG4816, APG5049, APG5875}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

unitName: Practice of conference interpreting and translation
description: This unit will complement APG5691 Intermediate interpreting and introduce students to the issues and techniques associated with conference interpreting and translation. Students will be exposed to the practice of conference interpreting and translation (introduction to simultaneous interpreting, communication skills, preparation techniques, terminology, ethics, and working practices) with a specific focus on international organisation's processes and procedures.
